code:
erDiagram
  ACCOUNTS ||--o{ ACCOUNT_ROLES : has
  ROLES ||--o{ ACCOUNT_ROLES : has
  ROLES ||--o{ ROLE_PERMISSIONS : grants
  PERMISSIONS ||--o{ ROLE_PERMISSIONS : maps
  ACCOUNTS ||--o{ TOKENS : issues
  ACCOUNTS ||--o{ AUDIT_LOGS : generates

  ACCOUNTS {
    uuid id PK
    text email
    text password_hash
    boolean mfa_enabled
    text status
    timestamp created_at
    timestamp updated_at
  }

  ROLES {
    uuid id PK
    text name
  }

  PERMISSIONS {
    uuid id PK
    text code
    text scope
  }

  ACCOUNT_ROLES {
    uuid account_id FK
    uuid role_id FK
  }

  ROLE_PERMISSIONS {
    uuid role_id FK
    uuid permission_id FK
  }

  TOKENS {
    uuid id PK
    uuid account_id FK
    text type
    text value_hash
    timestamp expires_at
    boolean revoked
  }

  AUDIT_LOGS {
    uuid id PK
    uuid account_id FK
    text action
    text details
    text ip
    timestamp occurred_at
  }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
